cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8)

# Name of the project (will be the name of the plugin)
project(silkeditbridge)

set(CMAKE_MACOSX_RPATH 1)
set(CMAKE_INCLUDE_CURRENT_DIR ON)

ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DBUILDING_NODE_EXTENSION)

find_package(Qt5Widgets REQUIRED)
find_package(Qt5Xml REQUIRED)
find_package(Qt5Network REQUIRED)
find_package(Boost REQUIRED)
if (APPLE)
  set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -std=c++1y -stdlib=libc++ -Wall -pedantic -Wextra -Wnon-virtual-dtor -Woverloaded-virtual -g")
  find_package(Qt5WebEngineWidgets REQUIRED)
  include_directories(SYSTEM /usr/local/include ../../../src ../../.. ../../../libnode/include/node node_modules/nan)
elseif (MSVC)
  message(STATUS "using MSVC")

  add_library(SILKEDIT SHARED IMPORTED)
  set_property(TARGET SILKEDIT PROPERTY IMPORTED_IMPLIB ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/SilkEdit.lib)

  add_library(YAML_CPP_LIBRARY STATIC IMPORTED)
  set_property(TARGET YAML_CPP_LIBRARY PROPERTY IMPORTED_LOCATION_RELEASE ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../../lib/libyaml-cppmd.lib)
  set_property(TARGET YAML_CPP_LIBRARY PROPERTY IMPORTED_LOCATION_DEBUG ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../../lib/libyaml-cppmdd.lib)

  include_directories(SYSTEM ../../../include ../../../src  ../../.. ../../../libnode/include/node node_modules/nan ${Boost_INCLUDE_DIRS})
else()
  message(SEND_ERROR "You are using an unsupported compiler!")
endif()

# Build a shared library named after the project from the files in `src/`
file(GLOB SOURCE_FILES "src/*.cc" "src/*.cpp" "src/*.h")
add_library(${PROJECT_NAME} SHARED ${SOURCE_FILES})

# Gives our library file a .node extension without any "lib" prefix
set_target_properties(${PROJECT_NAME} PROPERTIES PREFIX "" SUFFIX ".node")

# Essential include files to build a node addon,
# You should add this line in every CMake.js based project
target_include_directories(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE ${CMAKE_JS_INC})

# Essential library files to link to a node addon
# You should add this line in every CMake.js based project
if (APPLE)
  target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} ${CMAKE_JS_LIB} Qt5::Widgets Qt5::Network Qt5::Xml)
elseif (MSVC)
  target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME} ${CMAKE_JS_LIB} Qt5::Widgets Qt5::Network Qt5::Xml SILKEDIT YAML_CPP_LIBRARY)
endif()
